inclusion.criterion: HIV infected by OraQuick rapid test using saliva, venipuncture whole blood, or fingerstick
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CLIA-approved laboratory facility or by NIH Clinical Pathology Laboratory or SAIC-Frederick Inc Monitoring Laboratory
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of contrast-enhancing focal brain lesion(s) as seen on MRI or CT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to give informed consent and provided by Durable Power of Attorney
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to undergo the procedures involved in the diagnostic evaluation: lumbar puncture, FDG-PET scan, 201Tl-SPECT scan, and brain biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Permit the storage of blood, CSF, and tissue samples for future research use
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of prior malignancy other than PCNSL unless in remission for 1 year or longer; non-melanoma skin cancer and Kaposi's sarcoma excepted
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis, but it is unclear if this would be a contraindication to participating in the study.
